name: Color is everything (fireplanet, MightyDuck009, Dr_Medizin)
description:
In the near future, humanity will consume its news exclusively via the Internet from evil and manipulative online media companies. Opinions are manipulated, freedom of the press is history and print media is dead.

Baxter, a young entrepreneur, has set his sights on destroying the evil online news companies and bringing back the sacred print medium and freedom of the press.

To increase sales and attract more customers, Baxter goes looking for printer cartridges on his factory floor.

Color is everything here, because only through multi-colored newspapers can Baxter attract new customers and increase its sales in the long term.

Help Baxter in his fight against the evil online media and collect as many cartridges as possible!

Dreiforce/GameJam-2022: Color is everything (github.com)

Use a chromium-based browser!
